description: UI is Mixing UP,No Proper data Look

+ Navigation and editing of existing entries is easily possible using only the keyboard. In addition, this tool offers extensive possibilities.
You can track how much time and money has been spent, delegate tasks, add notes and timers, create your own view formats ...
The storage format allows for easy integration with your own programs.
- You cannot use it properly without studying the manual. Saving entries also requires too many actions.
> It would be nice to have an intuitive GUI for adding new entries, perhaps a simple form and a selection of parameters to add as building blocks. Creating entries directly in the tool's format could then be left to more advanced users.

Tiene un enorme numero de comandos y alias y tags y 
cuando tienes que trabajar o estudiar. Solo para masoquistas 
y desocupados.
